trigger_definition: CREATE TRIGGER trigger_abonnement_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON public.abonnements FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_abonnement_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER set_updated_at_entreprises BEFORE UPDATE ON public.entreprises FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION handle_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER facture_status_change_trigger AFTER UPDATE ON public.factures FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION notify_facture_status_change()
CREATE TRIGGER factures_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON public.factures FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION handle_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER set_updated_at_immeubles BEFORE UPDATE ON public.immeubles FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION handle_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER set_updated_at_locataires BEFORE UPDATE ON public.locataires FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION handle_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER set_updated_at_logements BEFORE UPDATE ON public.logements FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION handle_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER mission_status_change AFTER UPDATE ON public.missions FOR EACH ROW WHEN ((old.statut IS DISTINCT FROM new.statut)) EXECUTE FUNCTION notify_mission_status_change()
CREATE TRIGGER mission_status_change_notification AFTER UPDATE ON public.missions FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION notify_mission_status_change_extended()
CREATE TRIGGER missions_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON public.missions FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_missions_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER technicien_assignment_notification AFTER UPDATE ON public.missions FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION notify_technicien_assignment()
CREATE TRIGGER trigger_sync_ticket_statut_from_mission AFTER UPDATE OF statut ON public.missions FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION sync_ticket_statut_from_mission()
CREATE TRIGGER trigger_plan_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON public.plans FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_plan_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER on_profile_updated BEFORE UPDATE ON public.profiles FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION handle_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER trigger_prevent_role_self_escalation BEFORE UPDATE ON public.profiles FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION prevent_role_self_escalation()
CREATE TRIGGER set_updated_at_regies BEFORE UPDATE ON public.regies FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION handle_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER set_updated_at_regies_entreprises BEFORE UPDATE ON public.regies_entreprises FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION handle_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER techniciens_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON public.techniciens FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION update_techniciens_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER ensure_locataire_has_logement_before_ticket BEFORE INSERT ON public.tickets FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION check_locataire_has_logement_for_ticket()
CREATE TRIGGER new_ticket_notification AFTER INSERT ON public.tickets FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION notify_new_ticket()
CREATE TRIGGER set_ticket_regie_id_trigger BEFORE INSERT ON public.tickets FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION set_ticket_regie_id()
CREATE TRIGGER set_updated_at_tickets BEFORE UPDATE ON public.tickets FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION handle_updated_at()
CREATE TRIGGER trigger_check_disponibilites_before_diffusion BEFORE UPDATE OF statut ON public.tickets FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION check_disponibilites_before_diffusion()
CREATE TRIGGER tr_check_filters BEFORE INSERT OR UPDATE ON realtime.subscription FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION realtime.subscription_check_filters()
CREATE TRIGGER enforce_bucket_name_length_trigger BEFORE INSERT OR UPDATE OF name ON storage.buckets FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION storage.enforce_bucket_name_length()
CREATE TRIGGER objects_delete_delete_prefix AFTER DELETE ON storage.objects FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION storage.delete_prefix_hierarchy_trigger()
CREATE TRIGGER objects_insert_create_prefix BEFORE INSERT ON storage.objects FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION storage.objects_insert_prefix_trigger()

CREATE TRIGGER objects_update_create_prefix BEFORE UPDATE ON storage.objects FOR EACH ROW WHEN (((new.name <> old.name) OR (new.bucket_id <> old.bucket_id))) EXECUTE FUNCTION storage.objects_update_prefix_trigger()
CREATE TRIGGER update_objects_updated_at BEFORE UPDATE ON storage.objects FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION storage.update_updated_at_column()
CREATE TRIGGER prefixes_create_hierarchy BEFORE INSERT ON storage.prefixes FOR EACH ROW WHEN ((pg_trigger_depth() < 1)) EXECUTE FUNCTION storage.prefixes_insert_trigger()
CREATE TRIGGER prefixes_delete_hierarchy AFTER DELETE ON storage.prefixes FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION storage.delete_prefix_hierarchy_trigger()
